keyword: calories in double quarter pounder with cheese
title: Calories in Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in double quarter pounder with cheese: 740 kcal per burger, plus full macros, sodium, and tweaks for variations like no cheese.
h1: Calories in Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese: two 1/4 lb beef patties, American cheese, bun, onions, ketchup, mustard; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese contains 740 kcal and 48 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 740 kcal for the standard burger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in double quarter pounder with cheese?
faqs.a: About 48 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese?
faqs.a: Around 1260 mg, so watch intake if sodium-sensitive.

faqs.q: Are there trans fats in double quarter pounder with cheese?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.5 g per burger from the beef patties.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese?
faqs.a: Removing cheese saves ~110 kcal; adding extras like bacon adds ~70 kcal.
